definitions.text: the young of an animal cared for at one time
think moodily or anxiously about something
hang over, as of something threatening, dark, or menacing
examples: The terrible vision brooded over her all day long

definitions.text: be in a huff and display one's displeasure
examples: She is pouting because she didn't get what she wanted

definitions.text: be in a huff; be silent or sullen
